content: Hi all! We made a Reddit upvote bot, I've been working on it for the last 6 month and now, after many test runs, it's ready Here is the bot: https://t.me/Reddit_boost_botOur support: https://t.me/reddit_boost_supportOur site with FAQ: http://www.redditboost.siteWhy our upvote bot is the best? We found out that Reddit accounts and proxies that we're using is the most important things, as well as our algoritms, so now we're using ONLY very ols Reddit accounts with karma for upvotes, starting from 2 yo, and very expensive residential proxies, so all our accounts are highly trustedOur prices: $10 = 85 upvotes ($0.12 per upvote)$30 = 275 upvotes ($0.11 per upvote)$70 = 700 upvotes ($0.10 per upvote)$100 = 1 100 upvotes ($0.09 per upvote)$200 = 2 500 upvotes ($0.08 per upvote)$300 = 4 300 upvotes ($0.07 per upvote)$400 = 6 700 upvotes ($0.06 per upvote)$500 = 10 000 upvotes ($0.05 per upvote)Everything works fully automatically 24/7. We only accept cryptocurrencies at the moment And the most important After you top up you balance, sent message to https://t.me/reddit_boost_support with the following text: "I'm from Bitcointalk, add 50" and we will add 50% of the upvotes you buy for your first purchaseThis promotion is only valid in January
